items.summary: Update the existing first outro text block to add a third revealed line after the current two lines: "That can't be it..." and require a visible Continue button to proceed to the next outro block (matching the existing line-by-line reveal + gated progression behavior used in OutroFlow).
Add a new second outro block (after the first block’s Continue) that reveals the provided multi-line text line-by-line, and then requires a Continue button to proceed to the next block.

Add a new third outro block (after the second block’s Continue) that displays a 7-item takeaways list where each item is underlined and uses a pointer cursor; clicking any item opens a popup/modal containing placeholder lorem ipsum text and a link to https://lmt.lv.

Keep the expanded outro fully integrated into the existing post-game flow: the game-to-outro transition remains the same, and the outro continues to use the existing OutroFlow styling conventions (background gradient, typography, button style, and reveal animations) without introducing new navigation paths.
